DOC.brief_summary: The study will determine whether acute and chronic consumption of a beverage containing erythritol will improve endothelial function in patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus.
DOC.brief_title: Pilot Study of the Effects of Erythritol on Endothelial Function in Patients With Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus
DOC.criteria: Type 2 diabetes mellitus Otherwise healthy Pregnant BMI>35 kg/m2 Long acting insulin treatment Other major illness, drug abuse Treatment with an investigational drug within 12 weeks Treatment with dietary or vitamin supplements Smoking within 3 months
